LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.label: hydroponic basin
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin.description: A hydroponic basin can grow several plants quickly. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is cut.150 fertility
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: hydroponic basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: hydroponic basin (building)
LanguageData.HydroponicsBasin_Frame.description: A hydroponic basin can grow several plants quickly. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is cut.150 fertility
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin.label: advanced hydroponic basin
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin.description: Advanced hydroponic basins grow plants quicker and provide their own light source. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is lost. 210 fertility
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: advanced hydroponic basin (blueprint)
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: advanced hydroponic basin (building)
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Frame.description: Advanced hydroponic basins grow plants quicker and provide their own light source. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is lost. 210 fertility
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS.label: hydroponic pot
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS.descripti: A hydroponic pot planted into the ground. Requires power. 180 fertility
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS_Frame.des: A hydroponic pot planted into the ground. Requires power. 180 fertility
LanguageData.Agrarian.label: hydroponic box
LanguageData.Agrarian.description: A small self-watering wooden wood box with earth in it for growing plants. Requires power. 120 fertility
LanguageData.Agrarian_Blueprint.label: hydroponic box (blueprint)
LanguageData.Agrarian_Frame.label: hydroponic box (building)
LanguageData.Agrarian_Frame.description: A small self-watering wooden wood box with earth in it for growing plants. Requires power. 120 fertility
